doc:
June Lockhart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/June_Lockhart 0 June Lockhart (born June 25, 1925) is an American actress, primarily in 1950s and 1960s television, also with performances on stage and in film. On two television series she played mother roles, Lassie and Lost in Space. She also portrayed Dr. Janet Craig on the CBS television sitcom Petticoat Junction (1968–70). She is a two-time Emmy Award nominee and a Tony Award winner. June_Lockhart ( born June_25_,_1925 ) is an_American_actress , primarily in 1950s and 1960s_television , also with performances on stage and in film . On two_television_series she played mother_roles , Lassie_and_Lost in Space . She also portrayed Dr._Janet_Craig on the_CBS_television_sitcom_Petticoat_Junction_(_1968 – 70_) . She is a_two-time_Emmy_Award_nominee and a_Tony_Award_winner .
